entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse This was pathetic and sad. Tear gassing and shooting rubber bullets at Americans for a photo. 105000 dead from coronavirus  American cities frsying at the seams and you do this
